text: Papua New Guinea began competing at the Olympic Games in 1976.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), "Papua New Guinea" ; retrieved 2012-7-27. Their athletes have been in every Summer Olympic Games since, but not the 1980 Summer Olympics. The nation has never been in the Winter Olympic Games. They have not won any medals.Papua New Guinea at the Olympics , The Telegraph The National Olympic Committee for Papua New Guinea was formed in 1973. It was recognized by the International Olympic Committee in 1974. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== == Other websites == * * * Papua New Guinea profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Sport in Papua New Guinea
title: Papua New Guinea at the Olympics
